body: Your mystic connection with one type of wilderness has grown even stronger.
name: Spirit of the Wild
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Elves/New Racial Rules/Elven Feats/Spirit of the Wild

sections.body: Attuned to the Wild, Guardian of the Wild, elf.
sections.name: Prerequisites

sections.body: When you are in a terrain type you have selected the Attuned to the Wild feat for, you gain a +4 bonus on Perception checks made to act in the surprise round of combat. If you act in the surprise round, you gain blindsense out to a range of 30 feet during the surprise round. If you are in an area that qualifies as more than one kind of terrain, these bonuses do not stack; you receive the bonus for only one terrain type.
sections.name: Benefit
